mapper.sql: country_id, letter2, letter3, numeric, iso3166_2, country_en, country_cn, status, operator, update_time, create_time
mapper.insert:
SELECT nextval('t_base_country_country_id_seq'::regclass) as country_id
insert into t_base_country (country_id, letter2, letter3, numeric, iso3166_2, country_en, country_cn, status, operator, update_time, create_time) values (#{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{letter2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{letter3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numeric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iso31662,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: update t_base_country set letter2 = #{letter2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, letter3 = #{letter3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, numeric = #{numeric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iso3166_2 = #{iso31662,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_en = #{countryEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_cn = #{countryCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = current_timestamp where country_id = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
